column4: Is there something I need to enable? It doesn't seem like I can install anything using apt...
whats the exact command you used for apt-get?
You perhaps need a "sudo apt-get update"
Will that just update the sources, or does it do all system updates?
And all that does is update/upgrade sources?
So, everything that needs to be updated will be updated?
update=get fresh infos, upgrade=update applications ... it's a bit confusing
It's probably going to take a while since its 10.10
So will this do the same thing as the update manager?
apt-get update is really not dangerous at all
But, will this do the same thing as the update manager?
The GUI application to update your system
they usually also use apt-get, just with eyecandy around it
